Name: Milky Mojito
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in glass. Fill glass with crushed ice, add other ingredients. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Review: An anise laced alternative to a Mojito. The name refers to the opaque white colour of the drink after soda is added to the anis.
History: For more recipes, its origins and history, see the Mojito Cocktail .
